translations: 愤世嫉俗；犬儒主义；冷嘲热讽

sentences.sentence: He was dismayed at the cynicism of the youngsters.
sentences.translation: 他对年轻人们的愤世嫉俗感到伤心焦虑。

sentences.sentence: The awful cynicism of this made an uncomfortable impression, and most of them began to look rather doubtful.
sentences.translation: 这种可怕的冷嘲热讽给人留下了一种不舒服的印象，他们中的大多数人开始露出怀疑的神色。

sentences.sentence: Cynicism, in all its guises, really may make us see the world more realistically—though at a high personal cost.
sentences.translation: 尽管要付出高昂的个人代价，但不管是什么样的伪装，愤世嫉俗都确实可以让我们看到更真实的世界。
